unsudo: Used as text of a link
sudo-personal-unsudo: Used as text of a link
sudo-form: Used as text of a legend
sudo-unsudo: {{doc-important|Do not translate {{int:sudo-unsudo-submit}}.}} Refers to {{msg-mw|Sudo-unsudo-submit}}. Used as welcome message. Parameters: * $1 - username of super user (with link) * $2 - username (with link) * $3 - username of user, used for GENDER See also: * {{msg-mw|Sudo-success}}
sudo-success:
Used as welcome message. Parameters:
* $1 - username of super user (with link)
* $2 - username (with link)
* $3 - username of user, used for GENDER
See also:
* {{msg-mw|Sudo-unsudo}}
